talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>This cave previously had ample resources.<sp:5:0:0>
It is gradually yielding less and less.<sp:0:4:0>That is why I require support. <sp:5:1:0>But my
requests have so far gone unanswered.<sp:0:4:0>I must therefore continue to mine
without resting.
talk_08: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Angry>I hope that support will someday arrive.
